snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg wants to limit the sale of some large sugary drinks, but some popular offerings at 7-Eleven will still be available.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's proposal to limit the sale of large sugary drinks in New York City does not apply to 7-Eleven's popular Big Gulp beverage offerings; proposed ban exempts the sale of drinks in groceries or convenience stores.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg wants to limit the sale of some large sugary drinks, but some popular offerings at 7-Eleven will still be available.

headline.seo: 7-Eleven Big Gulps Are Immune From Proposed New York City Ban
headline.main: At 7-Eleven, the Big Gulps Elude a Ban by the City
headline.print_headline: At 7-Eleven, The Big Gulps Elude a Ban By the City
